abstract:
Very nice idea 💡 to make a vlog about this. 
P.S- nice running shots, hope no one runs with your mobile one day 😆, Jay.
Thanks for posting this.  We leave for Paris tomorrow and will try to hit some of these spots.  Merci!
Great idea for a video! Next, best spots for Sacré Coeur?
